pr_title: Admin filter for auto-confirmation service addresses

timeline.bodyText: Here we need to use getFilter not getDevFilter. DevFilter is the locally stored of the filter admin. Not great naming... should be changed to a more clear name...
timeline.author: chimp1984

replies.bodyText: Argh... thanks for finding that, switched to devFilter for testing: looks like I forgot to revert.
replies.author: jmacxx

timeline.message:
Admin filter for auto-confirmation service addresses

A service address can be filtered out using the admin key.  This would
be useful if a federated server failed, it could be filtered out so
that the auto-confirmation operates with the remaining services.  If
all federated service addresses were filtered out the user would have to
either confirm manually or use their own explorer service.
